pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with an aerial view of a dense forest of palm trees, with the camera moving forward steadily. As the camera progresses, the forest remains dense, and the background reveals distant hills under a clear sky. Gradually, the coastline starts to come into view on the left side of the frame, with the ocean waves becoming visible. The camera continues to move forward, fully revealing the coastline and the ocean, with the forest still in the foreground.
